name: Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers - Collector's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers
- Shadowbringers Special Art Box
- Expertly Crafted Dark Knight Figure
- Shadowbringers Artbook
- Shadowbringers Logo Sticker Cling
- FINAL FANTASY XIV Playing Card Deck
- Bonus In-game content: (Wind-up Fran Minion, Grani Mount & Revolver Gunbreaker Weapon)
